welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Whitman, a charming city known for its historic charm and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Plymouth Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to several major airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network throughout the terminal.
